snippet: With control of Congress within reach, party leaders say that Republicans will need to be realistic about what they can achieve and that a high level of party unity will be essential.
abstract: Republicans, with control of Congress within reach, are quietly assembling aggressive 2015 agenda built around push for a balanced budget and quick passage of measures to show they can govern; party leaders are warning fellow Republicans to be realistic about what they can achieve and that a high level of party unity will be essential since any Senate advantage they gain in midterm elections is likely to be narrow.
lead_paragraph: With control of Congress within reach, party leaders say that Republicans will need to be realistic about what they can achieve and that a high level of party unity will be essential.

headline.main: Uniting to Take Congress, G.O.P. Tries to Become the Party of ‘Yes’
headline.print_headline: Uniting to Take Congress, G.O.P. Tries to Become the Party of ‘Yes’
